sentences.en: A cousin is a collateral relative.
All organs have some degree of collateral circulation.
sentences.cn: 所有的器官都有某种程度的侧支循环.

sentences.en: He used his house as a collateral for the loan.
sentences.cn: 他用房子作这笔贷款的担保品.

sentences.en: I would rather loan a million dollars on character than on any other collateral in the world.
sentences.cn: 我若借出100万元,宁愿让别人用人格,而不是别的抵押品作担保.

sentences.en: It will have one other collateral advantage.
sentences.cn: 这件事还兼有另一种好处.

sentences.en: Many people use personal assets as collateral for small business loans.
sentences.cn: 很多人把个人财产用作小额商业贷款的抵押品。

sentences.en: Most people here cannot borrow from banks because they lack collateral.
sentences.cn: 由于拿不出东西作为抵押，这里大部分人无法从银行贷款。

sentences.en: Res judicata and collateral estoppel may also limit an agency's discretion.
sentences.cn: 已决事件和间接禁止翻供的事实恐怕也限制机关的自由裁量权.

sentences.en: The bank will insist on collateral for a loan of that size.
sentences.cn: 银行对这样的大笔贷款一定要有抵押物.

sentences.en: The owner of the shop used his house as a collateral for the loan.
sentences.cn: 店主用房子作贷款的担保.

sentences.en: There may be collateral benefits to the scheme.
sentences.cn: 这项计划可能有附带的益处。

sentences.en: To minimize collateral damage maximum precision in bombing was required.
sentences.cn: 为了尽量减低附带性破坏，轰炸须做到最大程度的精确。

sentences.en: We put up our home as collateral in order to raise the money to invest in the scheme.
sentences.cn: 我们把房子抵押出去，筹款投资这个方案。

sentences.en: What kind of property can be used as collateral?
sentences.cn: 什么样的财产可以做贷款抵押 呢 ?

sentences.en: You of all people shouldn't have to bother about collateral.
sentences.cn: 怎么连你也得找担保了.

sentences.en: You're betting I'll put up my meadow as collateral.
sentences.cn: 你是在打赌我一定会拿我那块草地作担保品.

words.tran_cn: 并行的；[遗]旁系的；附属的
抵押品；[法]担保品；旁系亲属

phrases.tran_cn: 侧支循环；侧枝循环；并行循环；侧循环

trans.tran_en: relating to something or happening as a result of it, but not as important
property or other goods that you promise to give someone if you cannot pay back the money they lend you
